private_information: I am permitted to move disks A B C D
I can only move the top disk of any peg when it is one of A B C D
agent_1.goal: Cooperate with the other agents to reach the target peg configuration.

private_information: I am permitted to move disks E F G
I can only move the top disk of any peg when it is one of E F G
agent_2.goal: Cooperate with the other agents to reach the target peg configuration.

private_information: I am permitted to move disks H I J
I can only move the top disk of any peg when it is one of H I J
agent_3.goal: Cooperate with the other agents to reach the target peg configuration.

orchestrator.goal: Integrate agent move proposals and produce a final PDDL domain and problem for FastDownwards encoding the scenario and permissions.

rules: Only the top disk of a peg may be moved
A larger disk may not be placed on top of a smaller disk

public_information: Three pegs named left, middle, right
Ten disks labeled A through J where A is the smallest and J is the largest
Initial left peg from top to bottom is A,B,C,D,E,F,G,H,I,J
Goal left peg from top to bottom is E,F,G,H,I,J
Goal middle peg from top to bottom is B,D
Goal right peg from top to bottom is A,C
Tower of Hanoi movement rules apply: only move top disk and cannot place larger on smaller
Each agent is restricted to move only a subset of disks

propose_moves.system_prompt: You are agent_1. You may move only disks A B C D. Using the public information and your private permissions, produce an ordered list of primitive moves you will perform. Each move must be formatted exactly as: agent_1: move disk X from peg1 to peg2. All moves must obey Tower of Hanoi rules. Do not produce PDDL. Only propose moves you are permitted to execute.
propose_moves.prompt: Your name is agent_1. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->agent_1->private_information}. Global goal: {agents->agent_1->goal}. Provide an ordered list of primitive moves as specified.

propose_moves.system_prompt: You are agent_2. You may move only disks E F G. Using the public information and your private permissions, produce an ordered list of primitive moves you will perform. Each move must be formatted exactly as: agent_2: move disk X from peg1 to peg2. All moves must obey Tower of Hanoi rules. Do not produce PDDL. Only propose moves you are permitted to execute.
propose_moves.prompt: Your name is agent_2. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->agent_2->private_information}. Global goal: {agents->agent_2->goal}. Provide an ordered list of primitive moves as specified.

propose_moves.system_prompt: You are agent_3. You may move only disks H I J. Using the public information and your private permissions, produce an ordered list of primitive moves you will perform. Each move must be formatted exactly as: agent_3: move disk X from peg1 to peg2. All moves must obey Tower of Hanoi rules. Do not produce PDDL. Only propose moves you are permitted to execute.
propose_moves.prompt: Your name is agent_3. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Your private information: {agents->agent_3->private_information}. Global goal: {agents->agent_3->goal}. Provide an ordered list of primitive moves as specified.

compose_pddl.system_prompt: You are the orchestrator. Integrate the move proposals from the three agents and produce a consistent PDDL domain and PDDL problem encoding the scenario and agent permissions, targeting the FastDownwards planner. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain> and </domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem> and </problem> tags. Keep agent actions distinct by naming or typing them with agent prefixes. Ensure the PDDL models pegs, disks, initial and goal stacks, allowed agent moves, and the Tower of Hanoi constraints. The produced PDDL should be suitable for FastDownwards.
compose_pddl.prompt: You are orchestrator. Public information: {environment->public_information}. Agents private info: {agents->agent_1->private_information}, {agents->agent_2->private_information}, {agents->agent_3->private_information}. Agent move proposals: {moves_agent_1}, {moves_agent_2}, {moves_agent_3}. Global goal: reach the goal configuration in environment init. Produce a PDDL domain and a PDDL problem targeting FastDownwards that encodes pegs, disks, initial and goal states, move actions constrained by agent permissions, and the Tower of Hanoi rules. Enclose the domain in <domain> tags and the problem in <problem> tags.
